meanings.definition: The act of killing one's father.
meanings.sent1: The patricide shocked the small town.
meanings.sent2: The police investigated the case of patricide.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about patricide.
meanings.sent4: The dark novel delved into the theme of patricide.
meanings.sent5: The history book detailed a famous case of patricide in ancient Rome.

meanings.definition: A person who kills their father.
meanings.sent1: The community was wary of the patricide living among them.
meanings.sent2: The psychologist studied the mind of a patricide.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character was a lovable patricide in a silly TV show.
meanings.sent4: The movie portrayed a complex relationship between a patricide and his family.
meanings.sent5: The folklore tale warned of the consequences of becoming a patricide.
